Package ca.ualberta.cs.cmput301t02project.activity

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BrowseFavoritesActivity
    Displays the favorited comments of the current user.
    BrowseMyCommentsActivity
    Displays comments that the current user authored.
    BrowseReplyCommentsActivity
    Displays comments replies to the current selected comment.
    BrowseTopLevelCommentsActivity
    Displays comments top level comments (aka.
    CreateCommentActivity
    Allows a user to create their own comment.
    EditCommentActivity
    Allows a user to edit the comment they selected.
    LoginActivity
    Allows a user to log in to the app with a selected username.
    MainMenuActivity
    Displays menu options.
